Job Posting:172141 - Position: W26 Data Internships, 2026 - Canada 172141 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 09/09/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 08/25/2025 03:11 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Shopify Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Winter W26 Data Internships, 2026 - Canada 172141 Co-op Position Various Locations Canada 4 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List About the role Being a Shopify Intern Our hiring process is unique. We match interns to teams we think they'd be successful in and what works best for Shopify. We're looking for: • Data Engineers to architect and manage the expansive data pipelines that fuel everything from product analytics to merchant- facing data products. • Product Data Scientists to deeply understand our products, telling their stories and figuring out how to make them 10x better. • Interns are expected to work in the office full time, with a hard minimum of being in-office 3 days/week. Working at Shopify • You must be legally entitled to work in Canada for the entire duration of the 2026 internship (January 5th to August 21st, 2026). Shopify does not provide immigration support to intern candidates at this time. • Our Data internships are 8 month long, full-time, paid experiences. • We welcome soon-to-be graduates, recent graduates, and self taught candidates with an interest in converting to full time employment after the internship term. • This is a 2026 Internship program. Future internship program dates will be posted on our website. • As a Data Intern you must be able to work from one of our participating offices: Ottawa (150 O'Connor Street) or Toronto (620 King West). Please note: if you don't currently live in Ottawa or Toronto, you must be willing and able to relocate for in-office experiences to the closest Shopify office to you. If successful in your application to the Data Internship Program, we will match you to a team when you start at Shopify. Onboarding • Interns must be located in their office city by the first day of Onboarding (January 5th) ready to work 9:00am - 5:00pm. You can't work from outside Canada About Shopify Opportunity is not evenly distributed. Shopify puts independence within reach for anyone with a dream to start a business. We propel entrepreneurs and enterprises to scale the heights of their potential. Since 2006, we've grown to over 8,300 employees and generated over $1 trillion in sales for millions of merchants in 175 countries. This is life-defining work that directly impacts people's lives as much as it transforms your own. This is putting the power of the few in the hands of the many, is a future with more voices rather than fewer, and is creating more choices instead of an elite option. Job Requirements Qualifications: • You love challenging yourself with projects or hacking just for fun • You are a constant learner • You have a passion for solving tough problems with code • You take ownership of the projects you work on • You enjoy research and figuring out how pieces of an entire project work • You take pride in creating simple solutions to complex problems • You have a strong commitment to quality About you Moving at our pace brings a lot of change, complexity, and ambiguity-and a little bit of chaos. Shopifolk thrive on that and are comfortable being uncomfortable. That means Shopify is not the right place for everyone. Before you apply, consider if you can: • Care deeply about what you do and about making commerce better for everyone • Excel by seeking professional and personal hypergrowth • Keep up with an unrelenting pace (the week, not the quarter) • Be resilient and resourceful in face of ambiguity and thrive on (rather than endure) change • Bring critical thought and opinion • Use AI tools reflexively as part of your fundamental workflow • Embrace differences and disagreement to get shit done and move forward Work digital-first for your daily work • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions In your application: 1. 2. 3. Include your resume. Answer all of the application questions. Once you submit your application, and if you move forward in our process, you'll then be emailed a set of mandatory assessments to complete. These will help assess your technical skills and your likelihood of success at Shopify. We know that applying for internships can be time-consuming, and we truly appreciate your effort. Our Intern Program team are actual real live people (??) and we're looking forward to learning more about you through your application. We encourage candidates to apply early as applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis.. Applications will close September 15th at 11:59pm (EDT). Our hiring process is unique. We match interns to teams we think they'd be successful in and what works best for Shopify. Find out more about our past intern experiences, watch our Intern Diaries video, and read through our Engineering and Data Internships FAQ to help answer any questions you may have about the Data Internships at Shopify. Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: https://www.shopify.com/careers/data-internships-2026-canada_7333e368-be63-4224-b8e1-0b4a77140cb7?ashby_jid=7333e368- be63-4224-b8e1-0b4a77140cb7 Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
